text: Yisakale kaya, ‘machiha ibane mara'iyame'i haiche allaha’, arasye sihamte kupharai karaiche. Athaca machihe kaiche, ‘he icharaa'ilara santanasakala! Tomaloke se'i allahara ibadata karaa yijana mora raba arau tomalokarao raba’. Niscaya yiye allahara lagata ansidara sthapana karae allahe tara oparata jannata haraama karai diche arau tara thikana ha’ba jahannama; arau yalimasakalara babe kono sahayakarai na'i
